project.name: YUI3 Gallery
project.description: Gallery module for working with asynchronous calls

Deferred.name: Deferred
Deferred.description:
A deferred keeps two lists of callbacks, one for the success scenario and another for the failure case.
It runs these callbacks once a call to resolve() or reject() is made.

This class is designed to augment others

Node.Deferred.name: Node.Deferred
Node.Deferred.description: A deferred plugin for Node that has methods for dealing with asynchronous calls such as transition()

params.name: config
params.description: An object literal containing plugin configuration

io.Request.name: io.Request
io.Request.description: Represents the promise of an IO request being completed

YUI~deferred.name: YUI~deferred
YUI~deferred.description: Methods for working with asynchronous calls

classitems.name: then
classitems.description: Adds callbacks to the list of callbacks tracked by the promise

params.name: doneCallbacks
params.description: A function or array of functions to run when the promise is resolved

params.name: failCallbacks
params.description: A function or array of functions to run when the promise is rejected

classitems.name: done
classitems.description: Listens to the 'success' event

params.name: doneCallbacks
params.description: Takes any number of functions or arrays of functions to run when the promise is resolved

classitems.name: fail
classitems.description: Listens to the 'failure' event

params.name: failCallbacks
params.description: Takes any number of functions or arrays of functions to run when the promise is rejected

classitems.name: always
classitems.description: Listens to the 'complete' event

params.name: callbacks
params.description: Takes any number of functions or arrays of functions to run when the promise is rejected or resolved

classitems.name: resolve
classitems.description: Resolves the promise and notifies all callbacks

params.name: o
params.description: Any number of arguments that will be passed to the success callbacks

classitems.name: reject
classitems.description: Rejects the promise and notifies all callbacks

params.name: o
params.description: Any number of arguments that will be passed to the failure callbacks

classitems.description: Imports a method from Y.Node so that they return instances of this same plugin representing promises

classitems.description:
Utility function for normalizing an IO configuration object.
If a function is providad instead of a configuration object, the function is used
as a 'complete' event handler.
classitems.name: _normalizeConfig

classitems.description:
Makes an IO request and returns a new io.Request object for it.
It also normalizes callbacks as event handlers with an EventFacade

classitems.description:
Returns a promise for a (possibly) asynchronous call.
Calls a given function that receives the new promise as parameter and must call resolve()
or reject() at a certain point
classitems.name: Y.defer

params.name: fn
params.description: A function that encloses an async call.

classitems.name: Y.when
classitems.description: Waits for a series of asynchronous calls to be completed

params.name: deferred
params.description: Any number of Deferred instances or arrays of instances. If a function is provided, it is executed at once
